changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.location_network ( id bigserial NOT NULL, parent bigint NOT NULL, relationship bigint NOT NULL, child bigint NOT NULL, inferred int2 NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, notes character varying, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, ordering ruleform.ordinal_number, CONSTRAINT location_network_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT location_network_relationship_fkey FOREIGN KEY (relationship) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT location_network_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT location_network_parent_key UNIQUE (parent , relationship , child ) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
